title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible API).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for browsing, pulling and chatting with Ollama models inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Scala friendly, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; includes Rails helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for running Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, Unity, Blazor WebAssembly.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI/CD) module that spins up an Ollama service for pipeline-based testing or deployment.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and retry middleware.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single docker-compose.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into threads with slash commands and role-based access.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with any local Ollama model via threaded messages.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM completion and summarization to your notes using Ollama.
